text: Athlétic Club Arlésien (; commonly known as Arlésien or simply Arles) is a French association football club in Arles. The club was founded in 1912. It was formerly known as Athlétic Club Arles, but in 2010, moved to the nearby commune of Avignon. ==References== Category:1910s establishments in France Category:1913 establishments in Europe Category:French football clubs Category:Arles
title: AC Arlésien
